pull.title: Add translator comments to `TransactionDesc::FormatTxStatus`
pull.body: This PR adds translator comments to `TransactionDesc::FormatTxStatus` as suggested in https://github.com/bitcoin-core/gui/pull/552#discussion_r812602741 and https://github.com/bitcoin-core/gui/pull/552#issuecomment-1097294710.

events.body: ~~Concept ACK, but I think this belongs in the [GUI repo](https://github.com/bitcoin-core/gui). It also does more than add translator comments, which should be in the PR description.~~

> Concept ACK, but I think this belongs in the [GUI repo](https://github.com/bitcoin-core/gui).

It does :)

> It also does more than add translator comments, which should be in the PR description.

This PR is based on top of the #552. Should be rebased after merging the latter. Only the last commit belongs to this PR.

> It does :)

Huh. Yes, it is. Sorry.

ACK 767304ee352e1c02bf9b5219555391b07473a5ff

The added translator's comments are clean and concise and clearly represent the meaning of the sentences they intend to explain.

@w0xlt This looks ready to be merged with or without addressing https://github.com/bitcoin-core/gui/pull/583#discussion_r887319552

What is your opinion?

events.message: qt, refactor: add translator comments in `TransactionDesc::FormatTxStatus()`

comments.body: 6 is a magic number, but you are not to blame.

I have written about how translator comments should be written here: [translator-comments.md](https://github.com/bitcoin-core/gui-qml/blob/main/src/qml/doc/translator-comments.md)

Extra information on what it represents to the user and where it is helps the translator think of a correct translation but also allows them to locate the string themselves in the GUI, which would also aid with translations.

I also have a branch with these suggested changes here: https://github.com/jarolrod/gui/tree/tc-fixup
Thanks. Great article. I updated the code with your suggestions.
"another" here is a little bit contradictory as it suggests that the other transaction is also unconfirmed; propose s/another/a/

Maybe simplify/avoid the temporary. Edit: never mind.

```diff @@ -42,25 +42,23 @@ QString TransactionDesc::FormatTxStatus(const interfaces::WalletTxStatus& status confirmed transaction. */ return tr("conflicted with a transaction with %1 confirmations").arg(-depth); } else if (depth == 0) { - QString s; if (inMempool) { /*: Text explaining the current status of a transaction, shown in the status field of the details window for this transaction. This status represents an unconfirmed transaction that is in the memory pool. */ - s = tr("0/unconfirmed, in memory pool"); + return tr("0/unconfirmed, in memory pool"); } else { /*: Text explaining the current status of a transaction, shown in the status field of the details window for this transaction. This status represents an unconfirmed transaction that is not in the memory pool. */ - s = tr("0/unconfirmed, not in memory pool"); + return tr("0/unconfirmed, not in memory pool"); } if (status.is_abandoned) { /*: Text explaining the current status of a transaction, shown in the status field of the details window for this transaction. This status represents an abandoned transaction. */ - s += QLatin1String(", ") + tr("abandoned"); + return QLatin1String(", ") + tr("abandoned"); } - return s; } else if (depth < 6) { ```
